Experience

  • I'm a Canadian/ Uruguayan teacher with over 5 years of international teaching experience. I currently teach nearly 30 students online per week. My current students are from many different countries like Vietnam, Colombia, Ecuador and Costa Rica. I have experience teaching English, Math, Science and Social Studies. To add to this I'm fluent in Spanish and develop software like this website, other websites, cybersecurity features and games. Below is my work experience related to teaching including my current positions.
